definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Kodi says In Brazzaville French officials will be looking for new oil supplies.
sentences.chinese: 科迪說，法國官員在布拉柴維爾會尋求新的石油供給。

sentences.english: Brazzaville is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 布拉柴維爾是其首都也是最大城市。

sentences.english: Wen first of all visited a hospital in Brazzaville.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶首先來到位於布拉柴維爾市區的達朗蓋醫院。
